```{r Packages, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(foreign)
library(panelr)
```

```{r Restore Data Set , echo=FALSE}

# Restore the object
soep.unedit <- readRDS(file = "soep_wide_unedit.rds")
soep.unedit
soep.un <- readRDS(file = "soep_unedit.rds")
soep.un
```

```{r even smaller data set, echo=FALSE}

soep.long <- soep.unedit %>% 
  arrange(persnr, welle) # arrange the table



```

```{r long to wide format, echo=FALSE}
soep.long <- as_tibble(soep.long)

soep.l <- soep.unedit %>% 
  select(persnr, welle, parleave)

data_wide <- spread(soep.l, welle, parleave)
data_wide

widen_panel(soep.l, separator = "_")
```
